Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.util

Class ByteBufferPrimitiveArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.util.ByteBufferPrimitiveArray
  • public class ByteBufferPrimitiveArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for operations involving ByteBuffer and primitive byte arrays.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByteBufferPrimitiveArray

        public ByteBufferPrimitiveArray()

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static byte[] copy​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Creates a copy of the contents of the buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the byte buffer to copy (does not copy the entire underlying array)
        Returns:
        a new byte array of size buffer.limit() with the contents from position 0 to limit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the buffer does not have an accessible array
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the buffer is null

      • reverse

        public static byte[] reverse​(byte[] array)
        Reverses the order of bytes in the given byte array.
        Parameters:
        array - the byte array to be reversed
        Returns:
        a new byte array with the bytes in reverse order
